title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: CSAV-Based Collaborative Activities for Enhancing Critical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex arguments in a structured format using argument visualization tools
Learners can identify logical fallacies in their own arguments with over 80% accuracy through peer feedback
Learners can generate three or more alternative solutions to real-world problems using the CSAV tool

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
